original_text: Half of Manasseh's tribe lived in the region of Bashan, on the east side of the Jordan River. Their borders were Baal-Hermon, Senir and Hermon mountain. They became very many people.
korean_text: 므낫세 반 지파 자손들이 그 땅에 거주하면서 그들이 번성하여 바산에서부터 바알헤르몬과 스닐과 헤르몬 산까지 다다랐으며

sentences.original_text: Half of Manasseh's tribe lived in the region of Bashan
sentences.korean_translation: 므낫세 지파의 절반은 바산 지역에 살았습니다

sentences.original_text: on the east side of the Jordan River
